name: @ownzones/smpte-timecode
description: JavaScript implementation of SMPTE timecode type

scripts.prebuild: npm_version=$(npm --version); if [ ${npm_version%%.*} -ge 5 ]; then npx use-yarn -f message.txt; else use-yarn || ( npm install --save-dev --no-scripts --no-save use-yarn && use-yarn ); fi
scripts.preinstall: npm_version=$(npm --version); if [ ${npm_version%%.*} -ge 5 ]; then npx use-yarn -f message.txt; else use-yarn || ( npm install --save-dev --no-scripts --no-save use-yarn && use-yarn ); fi

author: Dimitri Tarassenko
